title: Election Commission seeks AIADMK’s reply to Pushpa’s complaint against Sasikala | india-news | Hindustan Times
text:
Election Commission seeks AIADMK’s reply to Pushpa’s complaint against Sasikala india Updated: Feb 04, 2017 18:14 IST PTI , New Delhi AIADMK general secretary Sasikala begins interaction with party district secretaries at party office at Chennai. (V Srinivasulu/HT File Photo ) 
The Election Commission has sought the response of AIADMK on a complaint filed by sacked leader Sasikala Pushpa against the election of Sasikala Natarajan as party general secretary. 
Sasikala Pushpa had filed a complaint that the election was not as per procedure, official sources in the poll panel said here. Read more Sheela Balakrishnan, official who ran TN when Jaya was in hospital, quits 
Without sharing much details, the sources said the party has been asked to respond to the complaint but there is no timeline as it is not a ‘notice’. 
Pushpa had told the Commission that the elevation of Sasikala as the general secretary of the party was carried out in an “undemocratic manner”. Read more
